name: 數學教學解題（二）
description:
本課程主要進行下列教學活動：
1. 從高觀點來看中學的幾何及教師專業素養
2. 從高觀點來看中學的分析及教師專業素養
3. 從高觀點來看中學的代數及教師專業素養
4. 中學數學教師甄試試題探討
goals: 從高觀點來看中學數學相關數學題材，並作統整。
培養師培生的中學教師數學專業素養。
培養師培生面對中學教師甄試的挑戰。
培養師培生面對中學生在數學學習困難的教學解題。
syllabus:
In this second semester we will continue our explorations of those topics which are of interest in both collage, or graduate, mathematics and secondary school mathematics. 

Topics included will be geometry, number theory, probability, combinatorics, algebra, et al.  

We will follow the way as in the first semester, in each lecture some selected elementary problems, as well as their backgrounds, will be discussed. 

  

One of goals of this course is to cultivate future secondary school teachers (in mathematics). 

Students taking this course are anticipated to do a lot of exercises, practices and discussions.  

Each student is also required to complete a small project.
